Courses.name: Courses
Courses.description: Contains form related reusable functions and event listeners

Forms.name: Forms
Forms.description: Contains form related reusable functions and event listeners

Main.name: Main
Main.description: Contains generic reusable functions and event listeners

Validations.name: Validations
Validations.description: Contains validation functions and event handlers

classitems.description: Enables Drag and Drop sorting for dynamically added lessons
classitems.name: sortablizeLessons

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the UL element containing the list

classitems.description: Recalculates the lesson order within the module

params.name: id
params.description: The ID of the UL element containing the list

classitems.name: reorderLessons

classitems.description: Called after course creations, sets the step 2 form action attribute
classitems.name: prepareCourseDetails

params.name: json
params.description: JSON response from the create course action

classitems.description:
Event handler for click on .add-module
Adds a new Module under the current course
classitems.name: addModule

params.name: e
params.description: The json response of the create module call

classitems.description:
Event handler for click on .add-lesson
Adds a lesson under the selected module

params.name: e
params.description: The json response of the create module call

classitems.name: addLesson

classitems.description: Activates TinyMCE when the text tab of a lesson is loaded

params.name: e
params.description: The event containing the calling object

classitems.name: enableLessonRTE

classitems.description: Called after the files tab of a lesson is loaded, it ajaxifies the file upload form

params.name: e
params.description: The original event containing the calling object

classitems.name: enableBlockFileUploader

classitems.description:
Called after the lesson file has been uploaded, it resets the progress bar 
and includes the new object in the UI

params.name: e
params.description: The original event

params.name: data
params.description: The upload result object

classitems.name: blockFileUploaded

classitems.description: Called before ajax uploading a lesson file, it limits the number of files that can be uploaded

params.name: e
params.description: The original event

params.name: data
params.description: The upload result object

return.description: False if file can't be uploaded, true otherwise

classitems.description: Called after a course preview/banner image is uploaded, it appends the new element to the list and clears the progressbar

params.name: e
params.description: The original event

params.name: data
params.description: The upload result object

classitems.description:
Event handler for .ajax-form
Submits forms with .ajax-form class via ajax and fires the data-callback function if specified
classitems.name: formAjaxSubmit

params.name: e
params.description: Submit event

params.name: data-callback
params.description: What callback to fire after the ajax call succeedes

classitems.description:
Event handler for forms.
Called on all forms when they're submitted. It replaces the submit button label with "Processing...[loader icon]" and stores the old value in data-old-label attribute.
classitems.name: submittedFormButton

classitems.description: Restores the form's submit button original label
classitems.name: restoreSubmitLabel

classitems.description:
Event handler for .delete-button.
Fired by click on .delete-button and asks for confirmation
classitems.name: confirmDelete

params.name: e
params.description: The trigger event

params.name: data-message
params.description: What message to display in the confirmation prompt

classitems.description:
Event handler for .has-slug
Is called on keyup event for elements with .has-slug class. It takes the elements value and populates another field specified by the elements data-slug-target attribute with the slug version of the value
classitems.name: updateSlug

params.name: data-slug-target
params.description: What input to populate with the slug result  (css selector)

classitems.description:
Populates a second dropdown specified by 'data-target' with the values 
returned by the get call to the resource at data-url
classitems.name: populateDropdown

params.name: elem
params.description: HTML dropdown

params.name: data-target
params.description: What dropdown to populate (css selector)

classitems.description:
Event handler for .clonable inputs.
Fired on keyup on an empty clonable input - it creates a set of input+delete button after the calling element

params.name: e
params.description: keyup event

classitems.description: Renumbers the position label under clonable inputs
classitems.name: reorderClonable

params.name: name
params.description: The name of the clonable inputs

classitems.description:
Event handler for click on .delete-clonable buttons
Deletes the clonable input and associated delete button

params.name: e
params.description: Click event

classitems.description: Called after an AJAX delete call, removes the specified HTML element
classitems.name: deleteItem

params.name: result
params.description: The ajax call json response

params.name: event
params.description: The original submit event

params.name: data-delete
params.description: What element to remove from page (CSS Selector)

classitems.description: Sends the calling field's value to an ajax script

params.name: e
params.description: Event

params.name: data-url
params.description: What URL to PUT the form to

params.name: data-name
params.description: The name of the field being updated

classitems.name: updateFieldRemote

classitems.description: Flag, set to 1 when the "saving" animation runs, 0 when it finishes
classitems.name: saving_animation

classitems.description: Displays a saving animation when called with a 0 param, ends it when called with a 1 param

params.name: stop
params.description: zero to start the animation, 1 to end it

classitems.name: savingAnimation

classitems.description: Enables AJAX file uploading for the specified element

params.name: $uploader
params.description: The file object that is ajaxified

params.name: data-dropzone
params.description: CSS Selector of the element to be used as the uploader's dropzone

params.name: data-progress-bar
params.description: CSS selector of the element to be used as the uploader's progress bar

params.name: data-callback
params.description: What method to run after upload is complete

classitems.name: enableFileUploader

classitems.description: Displays saving animation after ajax form is submitted
classitems.name: formSaved

classitems.description: Converts the supplied element into a slider object

params.name: selector
params.description: The css selector of the element to be converted

params.name: data-label
params.description: CSS selector of the label element that displays the slider value

params.name: data-target-input
params.description: CSS selector of the input to be converted to a slider elements

classitems.name: enableSlider

classitems.description: Sets a slider control's value to the value of the calling input

params.name: e
params.description: The change event fired by the calling input

params.name: data-slider
params.description: The CSS selector of the slider element

classitems.name: setSlider

classitems.description: Sets a form's reply_to field to the value specified by data-id attr of the target

params.name: e
params.description: The click event

params.name: data-id
params.description: The id of the comment containing the reply box

params.name: data-field
params.description: The CSS selector of the hidden field containing the reply_to value

params.name: data-reply-to
params.description: The id of the comment the reply is for (can be data-id if replying a top level comment)

params.name: data-destination
params.description: CSS selector of the element that will append the reply after submission

classitems.name: setReplyTo

classitems.description:
Cancel's the reply state of a lesson comment. It removes the 'reply_to' value
and the "recipient"'s name from the comment box

params.name: e
params.description: Click event

classitems.name: cancelReply

classitems.description: Returns a slug version of the supplied string
classitems.name: convertToSlug

classitems.description: Redirects the window to the specified URL
classitems.name: followRedirect

params.name: An
params.description: ovject with an URL property, usually a JSON response

classitems.description: Static unique numbers holder. Used to keep track of used numbers
classitems.name: unique_numbers

classitems.description: Returns a document-wide unique number
classitems.name: uniqueID

classitems.description: Hides the current .animated-step element, unhides the next one and triggers a slideup animation
classitems.name: unhide

params.name: elem
params.description: CSS selector

params.name: data-target
params.description: the element to display

classitems.description: Reverses the unhide method
classitems.name: reverseUnhide

params.name: data-target
params.description: The element to display

classitems.description: Slide toggles an element defined by the caller's data-target attribute
classitems.name: slideToggle

params.name: e
params.description: The click event

params.name: data-target
params.description: The element to toggle

params.name: data-callback
params.description: The function to call when the toggle animation finishes

classitems.description:
Makes the element clicked inside the .load-remote element inherit load-remote
properties then fires loadRemote on it

params.name: e
params.description: Clickevent

params.name: data-url
params.description: The url to use in the ajax call

params.name: data-callback
params.description: The function to call after the ajax call succeedes

params.name: data-load-method
params.description: How to add the new content to the target (load|append|prepend|fade)

params.name: data-target
params.description: CSS selector of the element that receives the new content

classitems.name: prepareLoadRemote

classitems.description:
Event handler for a.load-remote
It loads the resource specified at data-url into the element specified at data-target

params.name: e
params.description: Click event

params.name: data-url
params.description: The url to use in the ajax call

params.name: data-callback
params.description: The function to call after the ajax call succeedes

params.name: data-load-method
params.description: How to add the new content to the target (load|append|prepend|fade)

params.name: data-target
params.description: CSS selector of the element that receives the new content

classitems.name: loadRemote

classitems.description: Loads more comments via ajax and appends them to the container

params.name: e
params.description: Click event

params.name: data-url
params.description: The url to use in the ajax call

params.name: data-callback
params.description: The function to call after the ajax call succeedes

params.name: data-target
params.description: CSS selector of the element that receives the new content

params.name: data-skip
params.description: How many items to skip in the fetch query

classitems.name: loadMoreComments

classitems.description: Similar to loadRemote, it loads the resource, but only once, later requests just display the content already loaded

params.name: e
params.description: Click event

params.name: data-url
params.description: The url to use in the ajax call

params.name: data-callback
params.description: The function to call after the ajax call succeedes

params.name: data-target
params.description: CSS selector of the element that receives the new content

classitems.name: loadRemoteCache

classitems.description: Flag, set to true if the scrolling unhide/reverseUnhide animation is running
classitems.name: scrollAnimationActivated

Fires the unhide method when scrolled to the bottom of the page and reverseUnhide
method when scrolled to the top of the page
classitems.name: stepsScrollAnimation

classitems.description:
This function fixes the navigation menu at the top of the page
on scroll.
classitems.name: floatingNav

classitems.description: Function for sliding to each section when nav button is clicked
classitems.name: scrollNavigation

params.name: e
params.description: the original event

params.name: prepend
params.description: if set to true, prepend to list, otherwise append

params.description: CSS selector of the element that receives the new content

params.name: data

params.name: data-progress-bar
params.description: The progress bar used in the upload process (so we can reset it)

params.description: CSS selector of the element to be replaced by the new stuff

params.description: the original event

params.name: data-replace
params.description: CSS selector of the element to be replaced by the new stuff

Fired when a comment area is expanded/collapsed, it rotates the arrow glyph
contained in the link element that triggeres the event

Event Listener for .instant-valid class.
Fired by keyup on elements with the .instant-valid class and triggers valid/invalid parsley events and callbacks for current element
classitems.name: fieldInstantValidCallback

params.name: data-instant-valid-callback
params.description: What function to call if the field is valid on instant check

params.name: data-instant-invalid-callback
params.description: What function to call if the field is invalid on instant check

return.description: True if the element was valid, false otherwise

classitems.description:
Event listener for parsley:field:success.
Fires a form callback (data-form-valid-callback) if all elements within the form are valid
classitems.name: formValidCallback

params.name: event
params.description: e

params.name: data-form-valid-callback
params.description: The function to call if the entire form is valid during instant check

return.description: bool - True on fired, false otherwise

classitems.description:
Called by fieldInstantValidCallback() - Fires the invalid form callback (specified by the data-form-valid-callback
attr of e.target) if specified
classitems.name: formInvalidCallback

params.name: data-form-invalid-callback
params.description: The function to call if the entire form is invalid during instant check
